longInfo:
Passport required.
- Passports and other documents accepted for entry issued to
  nationals of Estonia must be valid for the period of
  intended stay. 
Passport Exemptions:
- Holders of a National ID Card issued to nationals of
  Estonia. 
- Holders of emergency or temporary passports issued to
  nationals of Estonia

VISA NOT REQUIRED.

Minors:
- All minors who are nationals of Estonia are expected to hold
  their own travel document. 
- WARNING! In accordance with European Union (EU) Legislation,
  all minors who are nationals of Estonia will be expected to
  hold their own passport or National ID Card (where
  applicable) when departing from Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus,
  Romania or a Schengen Member State
